DOC.brief_summary: The goal project determine 6-session psychotherapy intervention help Veterans feel less deployment-related guilt less distress relate guilt . Half participant receive guilt focus intervention half receive supportive intervention .
DOC.criteria: Participant Served OEF/OIF/OND , posttraumatic guilt relate deployment event Moderate severe cognitive impairment , acute suicidality , current severe substance use disorder , unmanaged psychosis mania
